name: Follow The Trail
description:
I got bored on Halloween and decided to see how far I could get making a game in a few hours. Ended up spending 12 hours total, 6 hours on Halloween, and 6 hours the next day. I ended up with a surprisingly good result.

Updates V2
  • Made escape key exit the game
  • Brightened experience slightly so it isn't quite so dark on other screens
Credits

Created by Philip Edwards

Assets Used
  • Humanoids Monsters Pack
  • 41 Animations for Monsters
  • FPS STARTER (PACK)
  • Abandoned Psychiatric Hospital
  • Realistic Starter VFX Pack
  • Ultra Dynamic Sky
  • Weapon Kit
  • Ultimate SFX Bundle
  • Cafofo Human Vocal Sounds
  • Medieval Battle Sounds
  • Universal Sound FX
  • Ambient Soundtrack Bundle: Eerie
  • Andrey Sitkov - Triumphant Orchestral Music Pack
  • FreeToUseSounds
